comments.en: Toner and drum in one cartridge (10000 pages)

For basic printing functionality use the Postscript PPD. For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

PostScript L3, PCL5, PCL6, HP-GL/2

48 MB std, depending on flavour.

Optional accessories are duplexer, 500 sheet tray, hard drive, extra memory, ethernet adapter
